    • editTask

      void editTask(Task newTask, Task oldTask)
      Edits a task in the user's task list.
      Parameters:
      newTask - the new task to replace the old one.
      oldTask - the old task to be replaced.

    • removeTask

      void removeTask(int id)
      Removes a task from the user's task list by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the task to be removed.

    • getNewestTask

      Task getNewestTask()
      Gets the newest (most recent) task assigned to the user.
      Returns:
      the most recent task, or null if no tasks exist.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the full name of the user by combining their first name and last name.
      Returns:
      a String representing the user's full name, in the format "FirstName LastName".
